dcterms:description: A regulation that emphasizes data rights, including the Right To Be Forgotten (RTBF), allowing individuals to request the deletion of their personal data.
dcterms:title: GDPR

dcterms:creator: H. Iwase
dcterms:description: An overview of the Act on the Protection of Personal Information, which outlines data protection measures in Japan.
dcterms:title: APPI

dcterms:creator: E. Goldman
dcterms:description: An introduction to the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), which enhances privacy rights and consumer protection for residents of California.
dcterms:title: CCPA

dcterms:creator: L. Bourtoule
V. Chandrasekaran
C. A. Choquette-Choo
H. Jia
A. Travers
B. Zhang
D. Lie
N. Papernot
dcterms:description: A study on machine unlearning, which focuses on the removal of specific data from trained machine learning models to enhance privacy and compliance.
dcterms:title: Machine Unlearning

dcterms:creator: R. Shokri
M. Stronati
C. Song
V. Shmatikov
dcterms:description: Research on membership inference attacks against machine learning models, which can exploit the model's outputs to infer whether specific data was used during training.
dcterms:title: Membership Inference Attacks

dcterms:creator: J. Gao
S. Garg
M. Mahmoody
P. N. Vasudevan
dcterms:description: A study on deletion inference, reconstruction, and compliance in machine learning, focusing on the implications of data deletion in ML systems.
dcterms:title: Deletion Inference

dcterms:creator: Y. Liu
S. Ma
Y. Aafer
W.-C. Lee
J. Zhai
W. Wang
X. Zhang
dcterms:description: Research on backdoor attacks on neural networks, which involve injecting malicious data to manipulate model behavior.
dcterms:title: Backdoor Attacks

dcterms:creator: M. Chen
Z. Zhang
T. Wang
M. Backes
M. Humbert
Y. Zhang
dcterms:description: A study on privacy leakage in machine unlearning, highlighting how unlearning can inadvertently expose sensitive information.
dcterms:title: Privacy Leakage

dcterms:creator: R. Chourasia
N. Shah
dcterms:description: Research on true data deletion in machine learning, proposing methods for effective data removal.
dcterms:title: Knowledge Dependency

dcterms:creator: L. Schwinn

dcterms:description: A study on adversarial embeddings, focusing on attacks against safety alignment and unlearning in large language models.
dcterms:title: Adversarial Embeddings
